articles.title: When Trump needs cash, a California bank and one of its top shareholders have come to the rescue
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Donald Trump left the White House facing a cash crunch and a tattered reputation after his attempts to overturn the 2020 election, threatening the viability of his business empire.

articles.title: Judge rejects Trump request to dismiss classified documents prosecution
